snippet.title: Torchlight: Infinite - Official Hero Trailer
snippet.description: Meet the playable heroes of the upcoming loot-based action-RPG Torchlight: Infinite, including the gun-toting Carino, the elemental-wielding Gemma, DPS-specialist Rehan, bot-summoning Moto, doppelganger-manifesting Youga, and magic-blasting Thea. The beta for Torchlight Infinite begins on September 5 for PC and mobile (via the Google Play store or TapTap).
